name: leaderboards
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool live_golf_data.
Tool description: PGA Tour and LIV Tour live golf data for your application needs such as rankings, leaderboards, scorecards, and results.
API description: Fetch the most recent leaderboard for a given `tournId`, `year`,  and `roundId`. Query the `schedule` endpoint for the desired `tournId` and `year`.

Leaderboards are available 1-2 days before the event begins.

orgid.description: Identifier for the organizing body. Choose '1' for PGA Tour or '2' for LIV Tour.

tournid.description: The tournament ID for which the leaderboard is to be fetched.

roundid.description: The round ID to filter the leaderboard by a specific round. Defaults to None.
